query:
SELECT
            warp_special_light_cones.*,
            light_cones_text.name
        FROM
            warp_special_light_cones
        LEFT JOIN
            light_cones_text
        ON
            light_cones_text.id = light_cone AND light_cones_text.language = $3
        WHERE
            warp_special_light_cones.id = $1
        AND
            uid = $2
